privacy_notice.title: Privacy Notice
privacy_notice.heading: Project Application and Funding Service Privacy Notice
privacy_notice.how_we_use_your_data: How we use your personal data
privacy_notice.intro_paragraph_1: We are the Environment Agency and we run the Project Application and Funding service. We are the data controller for this service. A data controller determines how and why personal data (personal information) is processed.
privacy_notice.intro_paragraph_2_suffix: explains how we deal with your personal information. Go to GOV.UK and search 'Environment Agency personal information charter'.
privacy_notice.data_list_intro: The personal data we process includes:
privacy_notice.data_cookies: Information on how you use the site, including cookies
privacy_notice.legal_basis_paragraph: We are allowed to process your personal data to carry out a task in the public interest to manage flood risk. The lawful basis for processing your personal data is to perform a task in the public interest that is set out in law.
privacy_notice.no_data_consequences: If you do not give us this personal data we will not be able to register you as a user on the Project Application and Funding Service.
privacy_notice.analytics_intro: All data on this site is anonymised. Please see the following
privacy_notice.what_we_do_with_data: What we do with your personal data
privacy_notice.automated_decision_paragraph: We do not use your data to make an automated decision or for automated profiling.
privacy_notice.data_sharing_paragraph: We will not share or disclose your personal data to any party outside the Environment Agency without your explicit consent unless we are lawfully able to do so.
privacy_notice.how_long_keep_data: How long we keep your personal data
privacy_notice.retention_paragraph: User data is reviewed every year to ensure that we do not hold on to personal information any longer than is necessary.
privacy_notice.where_data_processed: Where your personal data is processed and stored
privacy_notice.data_location_paragraph: We store your personal data on our servers in the UK.
privacy_notice.dpo_responsibility: Our Data Protection Officer (DPO) is responsible for independent advice and monitoring of the Environment Agency's use of personal information.
privacy_notice.contact_intro: If you have any concerns or queries about how we process personal data, or if you would like to make a complaint or request relating to data protection, please contact our DPO:
privacy_notice.ico_intro: You can find out about your personal data rights from the
privacy_notice.ico_intro_text: The ICO regulate the data protection legislation. You have the right to lodge a complaint with them at any time.
